entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING IN EFFECT, Winterland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:46 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 13.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 13.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 12.4°C
Wind: S 19 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 13 except 8 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy and fog. Amount 30 mm except 40 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 13 except 8 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or drizzle. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain changing to drizzle overnight. Fog. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Showers or drizzle. High 12 except 8 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Drizzle changing to showers in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 12 except 8 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of showers. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
